700686f-a.text:
Burke Ave., east from (No. 717) and including Cruger Ave., to but not including Bronxwood Ave. The view is from the lower end of the uptown platform of the Burke Ave. elevated station of the I.R.T. subway, on White Plains Road. This area was formerly the J.T. Adee estate.
About 1917.
700686f-a.folder: Burke Avenue & Cruger Avenue, Bronx, NY
